channel.title: CVE Feed for avimegladon -- Custom Post Type Attachment
channel.description: The latest CVEs for avimegladon -- Custom Post Type Attachment

item.title: CVE-2024-4546|2024-05-16T07:32:43.000Z -- avimegladon -- Custom Post Type Attachment
item.description: The Custom Post Type Attachment plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'pdf_attachment' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
